appetizers.name: Carrot Corn Soup
appetizers.description: Carrots, corn, onions, spices with a touch of cream.

appetizers.name: Salmon Tikki
appetizers.description: Salmon, potatoes, spices, crumb fried to perfection.

appetizers.name: Spring Dosa
appetizers.description: Rice and lentil batter crepe stuffed with lightly spiced vegetables, served with sambhar and coconut chutney.

entrees.name: Baigan Masala
entrees.description: Baby eggplant, lightly spiced and baked, cooked in tikka masala sauce.

entrees.name: Malai Chicken Curry
entrees.description: Chicken cubes cooked in a light curry with a touch of cream cheese.

entrees.name: Gobi Gosht
entrees.description: Lamb Cubes cooked with cauliflower in a curry sauce.

entrees.name: Honey Garlic Shrimp
entrees.description: Shrimps cooked with honey, garlic, spices and green peppers.
